name: Erick R. Pajares Balceda
professional_summary: I am a motivated and passionate web developer with my first few months of experience in Node, React, Redux, PostgreSQL, Svelte, Tailwind, and Ruby (learning). Committed to continuous learning and problem-solving, with exceptional skills in critical thinking and problem-solving. Seeking an exciting opportunity to contribute my experience and grow professionally in a dynamic environment.

responsibilities: Collaborated in the development of features and maintenance of the company's platform, working with the Senior team to innovate and optimize functionalities.
Used technologies like Svelte, Tailwind, and SQL to ensure software scalability and meet client expectations through effective communication and problem-solving skills.
